verbose_text: (4) Because the use of Mg alloys enables the control of the degradation rate by adjusting surface modification, as well as alloy composition and proportion [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], it is possible to prepare an IAR with an Mg alloy at different degradation rates.
evidence: Mg alloys enables the control of the degradation rate by adjusting surface modification, as well as alloy
